title: Workshop on Designing Social Science Decision-Making Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific literacy and leadership experience
context.additional_context: A customized course for corporate decision-makers related to elementary education.

learning_goals: Learners can structure a social science decision-making space (problem definition → strategy development → reflection) into three stages based on real-world cases.
Learners can collaboratively design decision-making strategies that integrate scientific knowledge and social contexts.
Learners can systematically reflect on and improve cognitive conflicts (e.g., criterion prioritization) that arise during decision-making.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
